title: Nero 2016 Platinum v17 0 02000 Serial/Patch DVT
description:
Nero 2016 Platinum - "The Top Class" for your creativity Both innovative and reliable, Nero 2016 Platinum provides you with a proven and comprehensive power package of additional new features for burning, copying, creating, editing, playing, streaming, ripping, and converting your multimedia files â€“ with top-quality results on virtually any device!

What's new in Nero 2016 Platinum:

Top-Class Technologies for Memories that Last
------------------------------------------------
Whether you're dealing with music CDs, movies from DVDs or Blu-ray Discs, professional photo sets from family events, or smartphone snaps of your recent night out â€“ with Nero 2016 Platinum, you can burn, copy, and create long-term backups of the media and content you care about. And thanks to the new design and print templates you can give your DVD cases or audio CDs a personal touch!

THE 4K Wow Effect for All Your Videos
------------------------------------------
After importing your videos from your cell phone, tablet, or camera, you can quickly and easily create, cut, and edit them in Nero using professional tools. What's more, thanks to the Full-HD video edit preview function, now you can also do that using either single or double monitors. And if you really want to wow your audience with your slide show, Blu-ray Disc, or DVD, the Platinum package offers the full range of effects and templates.

Your Choice of Multimedia
------------------------------
With Nero 2016 Platinum, you can enjoy your media in the ways you choose, so that you can listen to or view your photos, videos, music, and slide shows or reuse them for new projects. And not just on your PC or laptop but also â€“ thanks to streaming â€“ on your mobile devices and other Wi-Fi players too. Just one advantage of the Nero Streaming Player App.

Break Down Barriers with Nero Platinum
-----------------------------------------
Want to reuse DVDs, AVCHDs, or Blu-ray Discs in your project? Then just rip them â€“ and convert them into the format that you need. Even music videos can be transformed into automatically sound-enhanced audio CDs at lightning-fast speeds.

Minimum system requirements for Nero 2016 Platinum:
-----------------------------------------------------
- Windows 7 SP1 Home Premium, Professional or Ultimate (32/64 bit), Windows 8 (32/64 bit), Windows 8.1 (32/64 bit), Windows 10 (32/64 bit)
- 2 GHz AMD or Intel processor
- 1 GB RAM
- 5 GB hard drive space for a typical installation of all components (including templates, content and temporary disk space)
- Microsoft DirectX 9.0 compliant graphics card
- DVD disc drive for installation and playback
- CD, DVD, or Blu-ray Disc recordable or rewritable drive for burning
- Windows Media Player 9 or higher
- Third party components such as Microsoft Windows Installer 4.5, Microsoft .NET 4, Microsoft DirectX or Adobe Flash are shipped with the product or automated download if not included in the package
- For some services an Internet connection is required. Internet connection charges are the user's responsibility
- Ultra HD (4K) Editing requires 64 bit operating systems: Windows 7 SP1 Home Premium, Professional or Ultimate, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
- Nero mobile apps except of Nero Streaming Player: Android 4.0 and higher, iOS 6.0 and higher
- Nero Streaming Player: Android 4.0 and higher, iOS 8.0 and higher
- Streaming to Nero Streaming Player and Nero MediaHome Receiver requires Windows 7 SP1 Home Premium, Professional or Ultimate (32/64 bit), Windows 8 (32/64 bit), Windows 8.1 (32/64 bit), Windows 10 (32/64 bit)
- Streaming highest quality resolution requires Intel Haswell (i7-4770 and above). It is recommended leaving the streaming setting in auto mode. If you experience performance problems with highest quality streaming, just use a lower quality setting.


Instruction:
---------------
- Remove previous version of Nero. Update didn't work for me.
- Install Nero 2016.
- Enter serial number during the installation.
- Do not launch Nero 2016 after installation.
- Copy patch to installation directory (see screenshots) run and hit patch. 
- No content pack 'cause I don't use it. It's 800mb and I'm sure you'll have it here soon.
- Choose what you want to install (custom installation) I'm only using Nero Express and Nero Burning Rom. (see screenshots)
- Anti virus software may give you warning for patch. It's false positive, ignore it. 
- Patch by DVT
- Enjoy!
